typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as short,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		ListPrice as double,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as short,
		ProductModelID as short,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceSalesDataFile
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as short,
		ParentProductCategoryID as short,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceSalesCategoryDataFile
SourceSalesDataFile, SourceSalesCategoryDataFile join(SourceSalesDataFile@ProductCategoryID == SourceSalesCategoryDataFile@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSalesFiles
JoinSalesFiles sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = SourceSalesDataFile@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = SourceSalesDataFile@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		ModifiedDate,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		Name = SourceSalesCategoryDataFile@Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DestJoinSalesAndSalesCategory
